mapper.insert:
SELECT seq_product.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO product (pid, pname, price, quantity, productdesc, company, madein, catnum) VALUES (#{pid}, #{pname}, #{price}, #{quantity}, #{productDesc}, #{company}, #{madeIn}, #{catNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET pname = #{pname}, price = #{price}, quantity = #{quantity}, productdesc = #{productDesc}, company = #{company}, madein = #{madeIn}, catnum = ${catNum}, updatedate = sysdate WHERE pid = #{pid}
mapper.select: SELECT p.pid, p.pname, p.price, p.quantity, p.productDesc, p.company, p.madein, p.catnum, p.regdate, p.updatedate, a.uuid, a.uploadpath, a.filename FROM product p INNER JOIN product_attach a ON p.pid = a.pid WHERE p.pid = #{pid}

SELECT p.pid, p.pname, p.company, p.price, op.quantity, a.uuid, a.uploadpath, a.filename FROM product p INNER JOIN order_product op ON op.onum = #{onum} AND p.pid = op.pid INNER JOIN product_attach a ON p.pid = a.pid AND a.mainimage = 'T'

OR p.pname like '%'||#{keywordValue}||'%'
